ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) d) The Information Management process (6.3.6), in its entirety, provides for the specification, development and maintenance of information items for documenting and communicating the extent of achievement. Information items used for the purpose of critical quality characteristics are sometimes specialized in nature. Sources for the description of these information items include industry associations, regulators, and specific standards. e) The Measurement process (6.3.7), in its entirety, provides for defining an approach that relates measures to the required
